result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam Z Berthold was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Adam Z Berthold is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Adam Z Berthold was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam Z Berthold

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Waiver of Right to Attorney and Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief filed by defendant.

Defendant, Adam Z Berthold, appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waiver of Right to Atty filed, Court accepts Waiver, Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 2, Judgment to be entered, Ct. 1 dismissed, $579.00 fine/costs, due today

Defendant, Adam Z Berthold, appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State gave sentencing recommendations.  Court addressed expungement issues, asked defendant if he would like to proceed today or schedule a future court date.  Defendant would like to wait to have plea/sentencing until expungement issues have been addressed by court officials.  Bond remains.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 27, 2015 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant, Adam Z Berthold, appeared. Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Quash warrant.  $500.00 signature bond.  Standard misd. conditions.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Hearing scheduled for March 6, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
Defendant Adam Z Berthold not in Court.  Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State requesting warrant, Refer to Br. 1 for warrant
